Buildings would start floating in the air and people would have to find new ways to get around.
Cars and other vehicles would be unable to move as they would be stuck to the ground, causing chaos on the roads.
Trees and plants would start growing upwards instead of downwards, creating a world where everything is upside down.
The oceans would start flowing upwards, flooding coastal areas and causing widespread destruction.
People would have to relearn how to walk and move around as their muscles and bones adapt to the reversed gravity.
